title: Sound On: Bank CEO Testimony, Infrastructure
itunes:title: Sound On: Bank CEO Testimony, Infrastructure
description:
Guests: Adam Goodman, Edward R. Murrow Senior Fellow at Tufts University, National GOP Strategist and Columnist, and Rep. Warren Davidson, a Republican representing Ohio’s 8th Congressional district. Bloomberg's Emily Chang spoke with Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
